_comment_logLevel: Logging level: 'trace', 'debug', 'info', 'warn', 'error'. Controls verbosity of logs.
_comment_logColors: Enable colored output in console logs for better readability.
_comment_traceShares: When enabled, logs all valid shares at trace level for debugging (can be very verbose)
_comment_cliPort: Port number for the CLI (Command Line Interface) server.
_comment_cliServer: Host address for the CLI server. Use '127.0.0.1' for local access only.

clustering._comment_clustering_enabled: Enable process clustering to utilize multiple CPU cores.
clustering._comment_clustering_forks: Number of worker processes. 'auto' uses the number of CPU cores.

redis._comment_redis_password: Redis server password. Leave empty if no authentication is required.
redis._socket_comment: Set socket to enable UNIX domain sockets, otherwise leave unset and set host and port.

defaultPoolConfigs._comment_defaultPoolConfigs: Default configuration settings applied to all pools unless overridden.
defaultPoolConfigs._comment_blockRefreshInterval: Interval in seconds to refresh block templates. 0 means refresh on new block notifications.
defaultPoolConfigs._comment_jobRebroadcastTimeout: Time in seconds after which jobs are rebroadcast to miners.
defaultPoolConfigs._comment_connectionTimeout: Timeout in seconds for connections to the daemon.
defaultPoolConfigs._comment_emitInvalidBlockHashes: Emit invalid block hashes in logs for debugging.
defaultPoolConfigs._comment_validateWorkerUsername: Validate worker usernames against a specific format.
defaultPoolConfigs._comment_tcpProxyProtocol: Enable TCP proxy protocol support for load balancers.
defaultPoolConfigs._acceptLowDiffShares_comment: Accept shares below the minimum difficulty threshold (useful for solo mining)
defaultPoolConfigs._acceptOldJobShares_comment: Accept shares for jobs that are no longer valid (useful for solo mining hashrate accuracy)
defaultPoolConfigs._showDifficultyUpdate_comment: When true, prints 'Difficulty update' messages when vardiff adjusts a miner's difficulty. Set to false to silence these messages.

banning._comment_banning_enabled: Enable automatic banning of miners based on invalid shares.
banning._comment_banning_time: Duration in seconds to ban a miner.
banning._comment_banning_invalidPercent: Percentage of invalid shares that triggers a ban.
banning._comment_banning_checkThreshold: Minimum number of shares to check before applying ban logic.
banning._comment_banning_purgeInterval: Interval in seconds to purge expired bans.

bannedAddresses._comment_bannedAddresses: List of manually banned IP addresses or hostnames.
bannedAddresses._comment_banned_list: Array of banned addresses. Replace with actual IPs or hostnames.

defaultPoolConfigs._poolHex_comment: Set this HEX value using a template of '<pool name> <pool link>' and provide it to various explorer webmasters.

website._comment_website_directory: Directory name of the website template to use.
website._comment_website_host: Host address to bind the web server to. '0.0.0.0' for all interfaces.
website._comment_website_port: Port number for the web server.
website._comment_website_stratumHost: Public hostname for the stratum server, used in web interface.

stats._comment_website_stats_updateInterval: Interval in seconds to update statistics.
stats._comment_website_stats_historicalRetenti: Time in seconds to retain historical statistics.
stats._comment_website_stats_hashrateWindow: Time window in seconds for hashrate calculations.

adminCenter._comment_website_adminCenter_enabled: Enable the admin center web interface.
adminCenter._comment_website_adminCenter_password: Password for accessing the admin center. Change this to a secure password.

tlsOptions._comment_website_tlsOptions: TLS/SSL configuration for secure HTTPS connections.
tlsOptions._comment_website_tlsOptions_enabled: Enable TLS for the web server.
tlsOptions._comment_website_tlsOptions_cert: Path to the SSL certificate file.
tlsOptions._comment_website_tlsOptions_key: Path to the SSL private key file.
